When a major incident candidate is identified, a push notification is sent to the Major Incident Management group. Assignment of a major incident can be automated at the time of proposal or promotion using the business rule Major incident assignment.

The major incident is assigned to a group based on the property sn_major_inc_mgmt.major_incident_management_group, and is assigned to an individual if the On-call scheduling plugin is enabled and a rota is defined for the group.

You can update the property and business rule to automate major incident assignment based on your business process requirements.

false major_incident_properties system_properties_ui.do?sysparm_title=Major Incident Management Properties&sysparm_category=Major Incident Management 3 1 5e9d3555f9149300964fd82f4d2b2ddd false true When a major incident candidate is identified either manually or automatically from trigger rules, the following actions are performed:

  • If the Assignment group is empty, the incident is assigned to the Major Incident Management group based on the property sn_major_inc_mgmt.major_incident_management_group.
  • If the On-call scheduling plugin is activated and there is a rota defined for a group, then the incident is assigned to the current on-call user.
  • If the Assignment group field is not empty, then the field is not updated.

When a candidate is promoted to a major incident and the Assignment group is not empty, the incident is assigned to the user who promotes the candidate, and the group is updated to user's group.

When a new major incident is created, the incident is assigned to Major Incident Management group based on the property sn_major_inc_mgmt.major_incident_management_group and Assigned to is set as the user creating the incident.
